thread.title: Democrat unimpressed with Bush's position on immigration
thread.title_full: Democrat unimpressed with Bush's position on immigration

author: The Hill staff
title: Democrat unimpressed with Bush's position on immigration
text:
Democrat unimpressed with Bush's position on immigration By The Hill staff - 05/12/15 04:54 PM EDT 
Freshman Rep. Ruben Gallego (D-Ariz.) is unimpressed with Jeb Bush’s position on immigration. 
Gallego told The Hill that although the GOP White House hopeful has signaled support for immigration reform, he needs to agree to do more for so-called “Dreamers,” the name given to undocumented workers who entered the country as children.
